data.comment: The big names in today's match at John Smith's Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. QPR get the game underway.
In the minute 4, Goal! Josh Koroma gives Huddersfield a 1-0 lead in Huddersfield.
Huddersfield take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Harry Toffolo.
The first-half is over at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Huddersfield kick-off.
Macauley Bonne is on a sub for Lyndon Dykes for QPR.
QPR make their second substitution with Dominic Ball replacing Geoff Cameron.
In the minute 56, The away team have replaced Chris Willock with George Thomas. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Dominic Ball (QPR) gets a yellow card.
Bright Osayi-Samuel is booked for the away team.
In the minute 73, Carlos Corberan is making the team's first substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Juninho Bacuna replacing Pipa.
Danny Ward is replacing Fraizer Campbell for the home team.
Charlie Kelman is replacing Ilias Chair for QPR at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Bright Osayi-Samuel with Albert Adomah.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a third substitution, with Demeaco Duhaney replacing Isaac Mbenza.
